docna.cdata!:
Dominica - Structural Adjustment Credit :
            Credit 1817 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Dominica - Structural Adjustment
            Credit : Credit 1817 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The Structural Adjustment Credit Project
            will support the Government's three year structural
            adjustment program. It is intended to raise the sustainable
            growth rate and strengthen fiscal and balance of payments
            performance. This will be accomplished by improving the
            incentive framework for investment, and exports, and by
            enhancing the efficiency of Government operations. More
            specifically, the credit will support a reform program
            encompassing: 1) trade, tax and investment policies; 2)
            agricultural sector policies; 3) public sector investment
            formulation and monitoring; and, 4) public sector wages and
            employment policy. This will finance all imports with the
            exception of luxury items, military goods, alcoholic
            beverages and tobacco products.
